spiritsExplanation:
The workout primarily embodies the 'Soothing & Restorative' spirit with a score of 0.8. The title 'Hip Mobility Routine' and description emphasize improving flexibility and mobility, which aligns with relaxation and recovery-focused activities. The mentions of 'warm-up or cool-down' in the description further suggest a gentle, restorative approach rather than an intense workout.

Additionally, comments like "chill out here" and user experiences indicating reduced discomfort and increased relaxation from the routine underscore the restorative aspect.

The 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit also scores 0.7, mostly due to the 'flow' reference in the tags such as 'mobility flow.' The structure of the video as a 'follow along' routine suggests a continuous, rhythmic, and connected series of movements.

'Structured & Disciplined' was considered but not selected due to a lack of emphasis on precise technical training or progressive overload.
